Text: New Charts and Alertfx FeaturesDear Forex Trader MG Financial Group is building an enhanced AlertFX system wwwalertfxcom that will deliver Alerts according to your specifications for the Technical Indicators you use on Charts News v Since it is nearly impossible to monitor the Charts hours a day you are probably missing important buy or sell indications while away from your computer screen Therefore wed like to help you stay even closer to the market by developing Technical Alerts which can be sent to your email address or wireless device Please take a few moments to fill out the attached survey questions and you will be assisting our goal of providing the most resourceful tools to facilitate your trading By filling out this survey by noon EST on Wednesday October th you will automatically receive free access to all three of Forexnewscoms Technical Analysts Market Services for week Cornelius Lucas FX Technical Analysis JP Choreks Market Chronicles and Technical Research Limiteds Daily Forecast The survey can be accessed by going to surveyalertfxasp Note All information received will be kept in the strictest of confidences and will not be disclosed to anyone outside of MGFG personnel Thank you for answering this survey For additional comments you can contact us at or by phone at Best Trading Wishes MG Financial Group
